trans-unit.source: Explains how to use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to install regular hotfixes.
trans-unit.target: Explains how to use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to install regular hotfixes.

trans-unit.source: To install regular hotfixes via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple
trans-unit.target: To install regular hotfixes via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple

trans-unit.source: Connect to the device serial console.
trans-unit.target: Connect to the device serial console.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Step 1: Connect to the serial console](storsimple-update-device.md#step1).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Step 1: Connect to the serial console](storsimple-update-device.md#step1).

trans-unit.source: In the serial console menu, select option 1, **Log in with full access**.
trans-unit.target: In the serial console menu, select option 1, **Log in with full access**.

trans-unit.source: When prompted, supply the path to the network shared folder that contains the hotfix files.
trans-unit.target: When prompted, supply the path to the network shared folder that contains the hotfix files.

trans-unit.source: You will be prompted for confirmation.
trans-unit.target: You will be prompted for confirmation.

trans-unit.source: Type **Y** to proceed with the hotfix installation.
trans-unit.target: Type **Y** to proceed with the hotfix installation.
